abstract: you 'll never believe where jk rowling first wrote the names of hogwarts houses .
article: j. k. rowling was n't sitting in her study , impatiently writing and crossing out names for the hogwarts houses . no -- the famed `` harry potter '' author had to get creative when inspiration struck . in a thread started by author ruth ware on twitter , one fan said she was forced to write a thought down on a napkin because she did n't have a notebook with her , which is why she always carries one with her now . in response , rowling said , `` the best thing i ever wrote on was an aeroplane sick bag .

came up with the hogwarts houses on it .
